helplines.title: Befrienders KL
helplines.body:
Emotional support hotline.

Confidential, free, non-judgemental.

24 hours, everyday.

Contact Befrienders suicide helpline:

03-76272929

Befrienders KL official website: https://www.befrienders.org.my/

helplines.title: Befrienders Penang
helplines.body:
WhatsApp service can be contacted through 011-56706261 and may use either Bahasa Malaysia, English or Mandarin

Offers face-to-face befriending at their center, strictly through appointment. Please call Befrienders Penang to arrange the meet up.

Operating hours from Monday to Sunday (3pm to 12 midnight).

Address:
Counselling Centre Penang (The Befrienders) Pulau Pinang,
Mewah Court, Blok 104 â€“ 1A,
Jalan Tan Sri The Ewe Lim,
Pulau Pinang, 11600

General call number:
04-2910100

Contact email:
pat@befpen.org

Befrienders Penang official website: https://befpen.org/

Official Facebook page: https://m.facebook.com/befrienderspenang

helplines.title: USM Counselling Office
helplines.body:
Exclusive for USMians!

Services include individual counselling, group counselling, individual support, group support, and psychology test.

Open from Monday to Friday (8.10 am-5.10pm).

Address:

Unit Kaunseling, Bangunan H24,
Bahagian Hal Ehwal Pembangunan Pelajar & Alumni (BHEPA) Kompleks Cahaya
11800, Gelugor, Penang

Contact numbers:

04-6535836/3410/3411/3459

Contact email:

salwati@usm.my
hidayah_halim@usm.my

helplines.title: Malaysian Mental Health Service (MMHA)
helplines.body:
Open on Mon-Sat (9am-5pm).

Offer a variety of services such as:

-Psychiatric Rehabilitation Program
-Counselling and Psychotherapy Services
-D'light Home -Mental Health Education Program
-Caregiver and Peer Support Services

Contact number:

03-27806803

Contact email:

admin@mmha.org.my

MMHA official website: https://mmha.org.my/

MMHA official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/MMHAOfficial/

helplines.title: Penang General Hospital
helplines.body:
Open on Mon-Sat (9am-5pm).
